headline: Is Republic Services (RSG) Pricing Look Attractive After Strong Multi Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Republic Services is still reasonably priced after its long run in the market, this article walks through what the current share price might be implying about its value. The stock closed at US$209.08 recently, with returns of 1.3% decline over 7 days, 1.1% decline over 30 days, 0.5% decline year to date and 2.1% over the past year. The 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 70.7% and 136.3% respectively. Recent attention on Republic Services has focused on its role as...
